column5: Great pics!
Naw it'd never happen, we're a team.  (Plus she knew the deal with me from day 1.   )
What are yea, dense man? Could I have spelled it out any clearer? LOL!
soo jealous, love the pics, nice job!
Great report Mike!

I knew this fish porn was coming after missing the invite by a night.  You didn't disappoint. Just wish I had been able to make it.  Thanks for sharing, I think. Now I won't be able to work today without the pics going through my head.
Wow great report Solo...  thanks for sharing!! Giving me the itch to get out there ASAP
My Hero is Bobby Orr....  you sir are coming close to de-throwning him.
alright I'm going to put "fishing with solo for a day" on my top 10 list of fishing destinations before I die...haha  thanks for the report and pix dude!  Ryan
Adopt me!!!!!!

I didnt know when i saw your invite that you were coming into the states. Maybe you mentioned it, i didnt catch it, but had i known.........i would have definitely met up and threw some floats with ya. Lemme know next time your down to visit, Im already here lol.........gears always in the vehicle.

Hey Mike.  You Suck! LOL  Another amazing chrome report.....we gotta get out at least once this year!!  Thanks for the opportunity....I'm still hitting my head on my desk here at work.....need something to wipe up the blood now....LOL.
awesome day of fishing congrats
yep, that would happen  I am seriously regretting being here to hand in that project yesterday.  I mean, its only 5 % and all that steel!  wicked fishin!
Ugh...utterly amazing report, yet depressing at the same time lol!  I wish we had those numbers in our Lake O. N. Shore tribs...
looks like a great day!
Don't do it Kemper....that's what got me in trouble last year....too much steel! lol

that looks like a pretty solid day fishing, doesn';t get much better than that..I can't wait until it's time to get into big number of huge steelies on the big river.  Thanks for rubbing it in with all the pics
Holy Cow!!!
Wow!  Fantastic Report as usual!  I can't wait to go catch some chrome myself.
but please!  im startin to twitch man!
i know man....class sucks....but hey i live in waterloo....so if you get your gear down there and pitch for gas we'll go hit some tribs....lemme know....    Hawk
I am new here (and as a result I'll seem quite dense, Im sure!) but where exactly where you fishing? Sorry if i missed something, but those were some nice catches!
Is the kingpin clicker really that bad?
You're da man!  As always.  very inspirational.
Great report!

I havn't slept since Sunday night so I'm a bit loopy at the moment. I worked 36 hours Mon and Tues, then left to go fishing straight from the office at 6am this morning... But hey that's the nature of the sport, you watch the weather, time the runs, and when things look perfect you drop everything and GO.  Needless to say this will be more of a "photo essay" as I'm a wee bit tuckered out  LOL!  Being alone today I took very few photos and the ones that I did take all look the same and aren't overly artistic  . I did get a couple of shots holding fish though as nearby anglers helped out...  The river today was loaded with chrome steelhead. This early in the season the fish are incredibly powerful and many of these fish took me for quite a ride.  All fish were caught on med. sized roe bags tied in white and chartreuse. Happily, today I confirmed that our local fish LOVE Alaskan coho roe. Thankfully I brought 20lb's of it home with me  .  Here's a smattering of todays catch:                                                           Fish on doods!
Nice job Solo.  Looks like a great day out there.  You kinda raised the bar on your last report though and I was expecting more
Amazing looking fish  can't wait to get into them this season  must be glad you went fishing instead of goin to work?  Great shots Great report!!!
BEAUTIFUL!!! wish i was there....
Those are some magnum chromers dude!!!
You're right, but my brain is mush right now
Doooooood!
Great report and pics solo  Looks like you made the right decision to go fishing after work.....  fun day out there  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Sweet looking bows good job!!!!!!
Holly mother of.... CHROME!  In the famous words of Wayne Campbell and Garth Haggar...  We're not worthy!  Dang I need to hit up a USA trib.  you suck. HD
Impressive Mike. Looks like a real fun day.
Some sweet fish there Mike !!! Make sure the wife dont pack up and leave with all this fishin your doing!LOL Great report and Pics thanks for sharing. BMM
beatiful shots where was i?
WOW...Awesome day on the water mike !!!   Some beauty chrome for sure,  very nice detailed pics too,  that creek,or river sure looks nice.....cheers
After my trip to the Ottawa river this weekend, it's noodle rod time!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I am sure I'll be bugging a few of you seasoned vets for tips!  Nice fish.
We need to ban you from fshing seriously!!! Great report now I am dieing to get out
awesome! Solid pictures.  -R-
Ahhh such beautiful fish, if they only came out of a cool crisp mountain stream...  And the pics turned out great Mike, they speak the language of love am I right?

I am sad, I just passed on an opportunity tomorrow for those zact same fish.  Mike,  I had no idea what you were talking about.  Please o  please, I will change my priorities, I really will.  Those are great photo captures too.
WOW!!! Awsome day. I hope you left some for the rest of us heading out this weekend.
lol wow! just put on a show! great day on the river....   Hawk

Sweet!   I can't believe how clear the water looks, in those shore shots, Solo. Aren't you lucky you acted on my advice!    I'm glad you destroyed major chrome, dude. The pictures are just fine. They help relieve some of the pain.  p.-
Great report and pics solo! Next time you have an invite for a partner I'm in.
I knew I should have played hooky
I saw this report coming from a mile away LOL.... Glad ya pounded them.  exotic roe catches em!!!!!!!!!!!!!  RY
